SEARCH
Package net.issachanzi.resteasy.model.association

Class Association

java.lang.Object
net.issachanzi.resteasy.model.association.Association
Direct Known Subclasses:
BelongsTo, HasAndBelongsToMany, HasMany, HasOne
public abstract class Association extends Object
A connection between two EasyModel classes, based on a field in one or both classes referencing the other

The following code section would result in one association between Actor and Movie. 


     class Actor extends EasyModel {
         Movie [] movies; // Association with Movie
     }

     class Movie extends EasyModel {
         Actor [] actors; // Association with Actor
     }

  • Method Details

    • init

      public abstract void init(Connection db) throws SQLException
      Sets up the database to store the association.

      This might include adding a foreign key to an existing table, or creating a new join table.

      Parameters:
      db - The database connection to use
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database query fails

    • load

      public abstract void load(Connection db, EasyModel model, EasyModel chainSource) throws SQLException
      For a given model instance, fetches the associated model instances from the database and populates the given model instance with the retrieved model instances.
      Parameters:
      db - The database connection to use
      model - The model instance to populate associations for
      chainSource - Model instance to break recursion on
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database query fails

    • save

      public abstract void save(Connection db, EasyModel model) throws SQLException
      Saves this association in the database
      Parameters:
      db - The database connection to use
      model - The model instance to save the association for
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database query fails

    • forField

      public static Association forField(Class<? extends EasyModel> clazz, Field field)
      Creates a suitable Association for a field of an EasyModel subclass.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The model class to create an association in
      field - The field to create an association for
      Returns:
      The new association, if one is supported for the parameters given. Otherwise null.
